global.description: Global values are values that can be accessed from any chart or subchart by exactly the same name.
global.title: global

nameOverride.description: Provide a name in place of `kubenav`
nameOverride.title: nameOverride

customPermissions.description: Define the custom permissions to be granted to kubenav
customPermissions.title: customPermissions

mode.description: Decide which access mode should be granted to kubenav: `readonly`, `cluster-admin` or `custom`.
mode.title: mode

namespaceLimits.description:
- apiGroups: [""]
  resources: ["nodes", "pods"]
  verbs:
    - list
Define a list of namespaces to limit kubenav to only access these namespaces
namespaceLimits.title: namespaceLimits

annotations.description: Annotations to add to the service account
annotations.title: annotations

create.description: Specifies whether a service account should be created
create.title: create

name.description:
The name of the service account to use.
If not set and create is true, a name is generated using the fullname templatev
name.title: name
